config.timestamp.column.name: ACQUISITIONDATE
config.query: SELECT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS reportingDate, M.AQUISITION_DATE AS ACQUISITIONDATE, CU.SHORT_DESCR AS currency, CASE WHEN gl.EXTERNAL_GLACCOUNT IN ('144000020','144000052','170150001','171030001','170150002') THEN 'Intangible' WHEN gl.EXTERNAL_GLACCOUNT = '171020001' THEN 'Immovable' WHEN gl.EXTERNAL_GLACCOUNT IN ('170050001','170120001','171090001','161020001','170090001','170070001') THEN 'Movable' ELSE 'Other' END AS assetCategory, CASE WHEN M.GL_ACCOUNT = '1.7.0.12.0001' THEN 'Computer' WHEN M.GL_ACCOUNT = '1.7.0.09.0001' THEN 'Motor Vehicle' WHEN M.GL_ACCOUNT = '1.7.0.07.0001' THEN 'Machinery And Equipment' WHEN M.GL_ACCOUNT = '1.7.0.05.0001' THEN 'Furniture and fittings' WHEN M.GL_ACCOUNT = '1.6.1.02.0001' THEN 'Buildings and improvements' WHEN M.GL_ACCOUNT = '1.7.0.15.0001' THEN 'Infrastructure investments' ELSE 'Other' END AS assetType, M.AMOUNT AS orgCostValue, CASE WHEN CU.SHORT_DESCR = 'USD' THEN M.AMOUNT ELSE NULL END AS usdCostValue, CASE WHEN CU.SHORT_DESCR = 'USD' THEN M.AMOUNT * 2500 ELSE M.AMOUNT END AS tzsCostValue, 0 AS allowanceProbableLoss, 0 AS botProvision FROM ASSET_MASTER AS M LEFT JOIN CURRENCY AS CU ON CU.ID_CURRENCY = M.CURRENCY_ID LEFT JOIN GLG_ACCOUNT AS gl ON gl.ACCOUNT_ID = M.GL_ACCOUNT
config.transforms.setSchema.schema.name: bank.asset_owned
